availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Morgan County, Ohio, farmer. Virginia native. Son of William Henderson and Jane Henderson. Married to Cecelia F. Henderson. Father of James H. Henderson, Sarah E. Henderson, and Charles R. Henderson. Farmer in Bloom, Ohio, in 1850. Farmer in Bloom in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Morgan County, Bloom Township, p. 103A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Morgan County, Bloom Township, p. 318-19.
"John Henderson (1822-1884)," Find A Grave, Memorial #6442513, accessed September 7, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/6442513.
